entry.title: Silk Cushion Liquid Highlighter Wand
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Silk Cushion
Price: 999.00

Introducing the Silk Cushion collection - a range of buildable, blendable cream-liquid face products that are married with a convenient, easy-to-use viral cushion-tip applicator for precise application that leaves you with gorgeous radiance that lasts. The name says it all, as the texture feels smooth like silk, and the shades are designed for Indian skin tones!

Highlighter: Discover the pearl-infused highlighter wands and unlock the secret to a luminous, soft-focus radiance. The collection includes two glow-giving highlighters: Dipped in Gold and Diamond Fizz
Whether you're in search of a pink highlighter makeup, a versatile makeup highlighter stick, or a liquid highlighter for face, the Silk Cushion collection offers it all, providing every beauty enthusiast with the perfect tools for achieving a dazzling highlight. Remember to twist & lock after each use to preserve the high quality of this cherished liquid highlighter collection.

Why is it special:

• Pigmented yet buildable liquid highlighter makeup formula that ensures flawless blending
• Precision cushion tip for easy, no-mess application of the highlighter pen makeup
• Treated Pearls brighten and add radiant, luminous soft glow, setting itself apart as the best liquid highlighter
• Enriched with skin-nourishing Vitamin E and Hyaluronic Acid, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin
• Designed for Indian skin tones, suitable for all skin types
• Weightless, silky-luxe liquid formula guarantees an even blend, setting the bar high for face highlighter makeup
• Remember to twist & lock after each use!
• Formulated in Italy
• Dermatologically Tested.

100% Vegan, Paraben and cruelty free.

entry.title: Magic Wand Highlighter Brush
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Makeup Brush
Price: 549.00

Designed for use with the Cha-Ching highlighters, this brush works equally well with other powder formulas. Featuring densely packed vegan bristles, this brush easily picks up and blends out pigments, whilst providing precise application on specific areas of the face with a weightless finish. Apply using small touches to your cheekbones, brow bone and upper lip.

Why is it special
  • Soft, tapered synthetic fibre bristles
  • Medium size allows for precise application
  • Features densely packed bristles
  • 100% vegan & Cruelty-free
  • Can be used with any powder formula

100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
